## Variables

### UseSourceFilenameForPromotedLocals {#a12cf73e5c2f477f5a3fbc3374dc82791}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>cl::opt&lt; bool &gt; UseSourceFilenameForPromotedLocals(&quot;use-source-filename-for-promoted-locals&quot;, cl::Hidden, cl::desc(&quot;Uses the source file name instead of the Module hash. &quot; &quot;This requires that the source filename has a unique name / &quot; &quot;path to avoid name collisions.&quot;))</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Uses the &quot;source&#95;filename&quot; instead of a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> hash <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> for the suffix of promoted locals during LTO.

NOTE: This requires that the source filename has a unique name / path to avoid name collisions.

Definition at line <a href="#l00021">21</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/functionimportutils-cpp">FunctionImportUtils.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If global value dead stripping is not enabled in summary then</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace any COMDATS that required renaming (because the COMDAT leader was</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = GO.getComdat()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Replacement = RenamedComdats.find(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Replacement != RenamedComdats.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">          GO.setComdat(Replacement-&gt;second);</span></CodeLine>
